There is also a good modern highway connecting all these cities, plus smaller highways running inland to various other towns.
Except for the Min River valley, where
are located. most of the terrain here is quite hilly. There are roads through most of it, and some — like the main
highway which passes through the region near the coast or the links from
— are modern multi-lane divided highways. Out in the countryside, though, there are lots of lesser roads and some villages in the hills have only a dirt road leading in.
